channel.title: David Naha - Cathedral (Dance, Electronics, and Synthwave inspired)
channel.description:
Hello,
There's that weird click sounds that pops up randomly when the kick attacks. It's quite noticeable listening with computer, compared to phone.
How do I make my music sound better?
I look forward to learn from you as well.
Thanks,
David
Track: https://soundcloud.com/davidnahamusic/cathedral
Project File: https://app.auxy.co/projects/F8rIO9Fx1pz9sjbvbU4Ysw==

item.title: David Naha - Cathedral (Dance, Electronics, and Synthwave inspired)
item.dc:creator: anon34001995
item.description:
I’ve had that click in some of my tracks. What I did to fix it is making a lowpass automation for the synth that goes down every kick. Like this:

I hope this will help you.

For the rest, nice track!

Read full topic
item.source: David Naha - Cathedral (Dance, Electronics, and Synthwave inspired)
